document_data.name: Galan Goadulphyn
document_data.mainbody: '''Galan Goadulphyn''', also '''Galan the Gallant''',{{cite book/Elminster in Myth Drannor|239-242|12}} was an inhabitant of [[Myth Drannor]] in the 3{{rd}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Appearance: He had only one eye. After falling off a sheer rock face, he became disfigured to the point of being nearly unrecognizable as an elf.
document_data.Abilities: He was an excellent throw with the knife.
